StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You find a staff on the ground and you reach out to touch it and the world goes black. You hear loud moaning filling the air and open your eyes to find you are in a dungeon. Men and women in latex outfit, tease and play with each other, and your body shivers with arousal. Suddenly you are back in the real world and the staff is gone, though a thought comes to mind. Perhaps you can create a new staff that will permanently trap others in a fantasy dungeon of lust and desire.
StaticSkill.Description: This spell turns the victim into a sexy, smooth staff, full of lust filled desires. The staff unravels the secret fetishes of others and lock them in wonderful sexual prison of delight.
